Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 76th/Loomis
ShortDescription: Eastbound 75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Racine, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 76th/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Racine, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 76th/Loomis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Reroute at Lunt/Ridge
ShortDescription: 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Clark, Touhy, Ridge & Lunt, due to street blockage near Lunt/Ridge.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lunt, Clark, Touhy, Ridge, then resume their normal route on Lunt, due to street blockage near Lunt/Ridge.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at O'Hare
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
